title.rendered: AVA Wins Certificate of Excellence from Trip Advisor

content.rendered:
Yay Us!

It’s official: we’ve received the 2013 Certificate of Excellence from Trip Advisor, putting us in the top 10% of businesses for guest experience.  A big THANK YOU to everyone who has helped us grow and improve over the years.  You are the reason we are able to offer world class experiences on trips across Colorado.

If you’ve taken a trip with us recently, we hope you’ll post a review on our Trip Advisor pages for Granite (for Granite zipline tours, rock climbing and Arkansas River rafting), Idaho Springs (for Idaho Springs zipline and Clear Creek rafting), and Kremmling (for Blue River and Colorado River rafting).

Thanks again from everyone at AVA….we guide Colorado!
